quote: The moon only shines because the sun lets it.
author: Elara Brightwind

quote: A clock with no hands is right twice a day, but it still won't help you get to work on time.
author: Jasper Holloway

quote: If you ever find yourself lost, just remember: someone else probably has a map.
author: Maribel Larkspur

quote: Great ideas are like stray cats. Feed one, and soon you'll have a dozen.
author: Reginald Thorne

quote: Success is just failure wearing a fancy hat.
author: Beatrix Widdershins

quote: No mountain is too high when you have a good pair of boots and a bad sense of direction.
author: Finnian Copperfield

quote: Wisdom is knowing when to speak. Genius is knowing when to nap instead.
author: Eleanor Tiddleworth

quote: A shortcut is just a long cut that hasn’t been proven wrong yet.
author: Hugo Brass

quote: The universe is full of mysteries, and most of them are just misplaced socks.
author: Sylvia Starcrest

quote: Life’s a garden—sometimes you bloom, sometimes you get eaten by rabbits.
author: Oliver Thistledown

quote: The key to happiness is knowing which doors to lock and which to leave open.
author: Dorian Highcastle

quote: If life gives you lemons, demand to see life’s manager.
author: Penelope Finch

quote: A whisper can move mountains if the right ears are listening.
author: Ezekiel Vale

quote: Doubt is just curiosity wearing a frown.
author: Loretta Moonshadow

quote: Dream big, but carry a small umbrella. Reality loves a good downpour.
author: Samuel Driftwood

quote: The past is a book with missing pages—what matters is the story you write next.
author: Isadora Vex

quote: A candle loses nothing by lighting another, but a bonfire loses patience.
author: Felix Emberheart

quote: Sometimes the best plan is to trip gracefully into success.
author: Winifred Plum

quote: The loudest person in the room is usually trying to convince themselves.
author: Benedict Crowe

quote: Life’s greatest mysteries are love, time, and where all your pens disappear to.
author: Margot Everly

quote: You can’t make everyone happy—especially yourself if you try.
author: Terrence Hollow

quote: An empty wallet is just a full story waiting to happen.
author: Juno Wayfarer

quote: If the road is too easy, you might be sleepwalking.
author: Cassius Lockwood

quote: A goal without a deadline is just a daydream with good PR.
author: Lucinda Fallow

quote: Genius and madness are two sides of the same coin—spend wisely.
author: Octavius Grimm

quote: A well-placed wink can be more powerful than a thousand words.
author: Victoria Sterling

quote: The universe is infinite, but your excuses don’t have to be.
author: Harlan Quill

quote: Courage is just fear that’s been bribed with a good story.
author: Delphine Ashworth

quote: If you're going to make a mistake, make it with confidence.
author: Silas Redfern

quote: Laziness is just efficiency in disguise.
author: Beaumont Thorne
